post:
Hey guys,

It's been a while, since I posted the last offer on here. There have been some changes, and I will list them bellow:

  • - A new support team member is beeing hired, to ensure that the support tickets get handled in timely manner.
  • - A new location has oppened - Chicago (deals bellow)
  • - I've been involved in a new brand development the past couple of months and it is time to go public. It is based in Eastern Europe, which will soon launch some new awesome VM deals, based out of my country.
  • - DDoS protection in Chicago is now rolled out
  • - DDoS protection in LA is in progress and has 2 months ETA on being available for customers.
  • - And much more to come the following 2 months! New locations, new offers, new services, new addons!
After having some problems recently with one of our nodes, we have provisioned a brand new one in Seattle and every new orders goes to there, straight.

And here are the deals for today:
